lexUnit.name: sword.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a weapon with a long metal blade and a hilt with a handguard, used for thrusting or striking and often worn as part of ceremonial dress.

sentence.text: A smirking matador , with a pink satin bottom even tighter and more uppity than Angel 's , was lifting his jewelled sword for the kill .
